elements.2211.03300_493999ba6ee580c8c09fd6f9320f2: Dear Editors and Reviewers, We express our gratitude for your time and effort in consideration of this manuscript
elements.2211.03300_cac3776ead936e48df02c30cff562: " to be considered for publication in the IEEE Transactions on Cloud Computing

elements.2211.03300_946f30173d4dbb893ea846d963998: Heterogeneous federated learning via grouped sequential-to-parallel training." In
elements.2211.03300_732354ade152c7658ccd845af3cf3: In preparation of this submission, we have added a significant volume of technical material compared to the conference version
elements.2211.03300_8b6bacb9b3096ffc48da8ea17285c: We have not only presented new algorithms with in-depth theoretical analysis but also extensive experiments to back up the proposals
elements.2211.03300_4c88b2adaf38b8c4f6ba7555cf83d: In the following, we present a list of new contributions we have included in this submission:
elements.2211.03300_59353b381fcde403823c03aea0637: In addition to the problem of
elements.2211.03300_aa32c29be18301b2202ec4217a2e0: in the conference version, this version takes into account the extremely demanding requirements of Industrial Metaverse for task precision and system efficiency, and is optimized for the
elements.2211.03300_aed3055866ba1f93940d811cc1a21: caused by industrial streaming data and the
elements.2211.03300_6634298a72057d25d163b1c65d9b8: caused by the low available communication bandwidth of industrial networks (e.g., LPWANs).
elements.2211.03300_f40c9ab6ca17d4705c06dac4302a1: For new streaming data settings and two new challenges, this version (a) proposes a semantic compression and compensation mechanism (SCC) that enables historical data to be recorded and stored in a lightweight form on sensors with limited memory
elements.2211.03300_8e6ca4e5fca889824f5614c0bbd88: The stored data can be used to calibrate classifier parameters to alleviate learning forgetting
elements.2211.03300_cbc53e9a5b4a6363c2a41caffee4f: Then, (b) an layer-wise alternative synchronization protocol (LASP) is proposed, which allocates more communication resources to synchronize important but lightweight classifier parameters, but with much less traffic, making it well-suited for bandwidth-limited LPWAN networks.
elements.2211.03300_cd9558cf4608d2a23ef0c17fce9b4: We found that for the forgetting problem brought by streaming data, there is a gap between the replayed data and the current data, and simply fusing them leads to confusion and poor performance
elements.2211.03300_ba772081b2ec7512926f2e9c2fe43: To this end, we formulated this gap and proposed a low-footprint compensation module to bridge them
elements.2211.03300_a94de032471f2bf9e181552c376f6: Numerical results in our experiments demonstrate its necessity and effectiveness.
elements.2211.03300_c499fe376d1cbef57bcd23917fb6c: Taking the previous method for traditional static offline data as HFedMS-S, we name the new method HFedMS-D and re-validate the previous conclusions on dynamic streaming data
elements.2211.03300_ac66325183da42c75fb91483df773: We conduct ablation experiments to help readers understand the success of our four modules
elements.2211.03300_3e2a99b8f201a7781908c172d9bad: The results are promising, all in all, our new method has four advantages over 8 well-known benchmarks:
elements.2211.03300_ef7ae450091c33627b5d77d849bcb: , making it highly competitive in harsh industrial environments.
